titleStmt.title: A moderate answer to certain immoderate quæries laid down in a printed paper, entituled, A brief relation, containing an abreviation of the arguments urged by the late Protector against the government of this nation by a King, &c. To convince men of the danger and inconveniencie thereof. Published for the good and information of Parliament, Army and people. By Charles Noble Gent. an honorer of his present Highness and Parliament, and a great lover of his country.
titleStmt.author: Noble, Charles, Gent.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Marsh at the Princes Armes in Chancery-lane,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "feb: 24 1658. Feb. 24"; the 9 in the imprint date hs been crossed out and replaced with an "8".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
